algorithm_technique: Iterate through columns, find max, and replace -1 values
problem_summary_simple: Replace all -1s in a matrix with the maximum value in their respective columns.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through each column of the matrix, find the maximum non-negative value, and then replace all -1s in that column with the found maximum.
key_insights: The modification for each column is independent of other columns.
Pre-calculating the maximum for each column before modification simplifies the process.
The constraint that each column has at least one non-negative integer guarantees a valid replacement value.
